/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the day. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, ready to step out of the car and explore the city.
